properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Christ has for sin
Atonement made
What a wonderful Savior
We are redeemed the price is paid
What a wonderful Savior

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
What a wonderful Savior is Jesus my Jesus
What a wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I praise Him for His
Cleansing blood what a wonderful Savior
That reconciled my soul to God
What a wonderful Savior

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He cleanses me from all my sin
What a wonderful Savior
And now He reigns and rules within
What a wonderful Savior

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He walks beside me in the way
What a wonderful Savior
And keeps me faithful day by day
What a wonderful Savior

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He gives me
Overcoming power
What a wonderful Savior
And triumph in each trying hour
What a wonderful Savior

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
To Him I've given all my heart
What a wonderful Savior
The world shall never share a part
What a wonderful Savior
